Package com.netflix.governator.auto

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AutoContext
    Context for the auto module to provide context to any Condition
    Condition<T>
    Module condition that must be paired with a Conditional annotation
    ModuleListProvider
    Plugin interface for a module provider, such as a ClassPathScannerModuleProvider or a ServiceLoaderModuleProvider.
    ModuleProvider
    To be use with any module added to the bootstrap phase of AutoModule and is used to copy bindings from the bootstrap phase to the main injector.
    PropertySource
    Very simple config interface to be used by Conditions to gain access to any type of configuration.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractPropertySource  
    ClassPathConditionalModuleListProvider
    ClassPath scanner using Guava's ClassPath
    ClassPathModuleListProvider
    ClassPath scanner using Guava's ClassPath
    DefaultPropertySource  
    ModuleListProviders
    Utility class with convenience methods for creating various standard ModuleListProvider implementations.
    ModuleProviders  
    PropertiesPropertySource  
    ServiceLoaderModuleListProvider
    Load Module.class modules from the ServerLoader but filter out any modules that have no profile condition.
